column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Katara says : " Whenever you 're ready . "
#Text=Korra says : " What 's the point ?
#Text=A crazy man poisoned me and now I ca n't dress myself , or cook for myself , o - or do anything for myself !
#Text=And this whole time , my friends have been off helping the world while I 'm stuck with you and you ca n't even heal me !
#Text=" Korra says : " That came out wrong .
#Text=" Katara says : " It 's ... all right .
#Text=Let your anger and frustration flow like water .
#Text=" Korra says : " I am trying to understand why this happened to me , but nothing makes any sense !
#Text=I 'm tired , Katara .
#Text=I 'm so tired .
#Text=" Katara says : " Korra , I know you feel alone right now .
#Text=But you 're not the first Avatar who 's had to overcome great suffering .
#Text=Can you imagine how much pain Aang felt when he learned that his entire culture was taken from him ?
#Text=" Korra says : " That ... must have been so awful .
#Text=" Katara says : " But he never let it destroy his spirit .
#Text=He chose to find meaning in his suffering and eventually ... found peace .
#Text=" Korra says : " And ... what am I going to find if I ... get through this ?
#Text=" Katara says : " I do n't know .
#Text=But wo n't it be interesting to find out ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Close your eyes .
#Text=Visualize yourself walking over to Naga .
#Text=Can you see it ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Yes .
#Text=" Katara says : " Now ... take that first step .
#Text=" Korra says : " Where 'd you come from , little cutie ?
#Text=" Korra says : " You can see her , too ?
#Text="
